rows.label: qst102715_msg0001
rows.name:
Grandpa... he's been resting
more and more lately.

rows.label: qst102715_msg0002
rows.name:
He doesn't go to see
plays much anymore...

rows.label: qst102715_msg0003
rows.name:
I wonder if we can find a doctor
who can heal my grandpa...

rows.label: qst102715_msg0102
rows.name:
...That's great! I'll be waiting
for them to make grandpa better.
